Package com.thales.dis.mobile.idcloud.auth.ui.pin

Interface SecurePinPadUiCallback

  • public interface SecurePinPadUiCallback
    A callback that contains methods for managing PIN authentication.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller
      A callback to cancel the authentication.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onEnterPin​(SecurePinPad pinPad, ScenarioContext scenarioContext, SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller controller)
      Called when a PIN authentication starts.

    • Method Detail

      • onEnterPin

        void onEnterPin​(@NonNull
                SecurePinPad pinPad,
                @NonNull
                ScenarioContext scenarioContext,
                @NonNull
                SecurePinPadUiCallback.Controller controller)
        Called when a PIN authentication starts.

        The developer should show pinPad to the user.
        Parameters:
        pinPad - The secure PIN pad to show to the user.
        scenarioContext - The details of the authentication.
        controller - The callback to cancel the authentication.
        Since:
        1.0.0
